title: Fonz- Huesca- Aragon
author: Katherine Dau
desc: The town of Fonz holds a feast of the Assumption on August 15 every year.

title: Romanos- Zaragoza- Aragon
author: Katherine Dau
desc: On August 25 each year- the town processes to the hermitage of Remedios.

title: Dona Maria- Almeria- Andalucia
author: Katherine Dau
desc: The town holds a festival to the Virgon de los Remedios and St. Teresa from October 12-15 each year.
